channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED][Additional Gaming Catagories]Getting more Organic Traffic to Mopar
channel.description:
[size=10pt]Howdy Moparian Staff,
I noticed that in the past year the was a huge decline of traffic to the moparscape community. Back in 2007-2010 this community was way more live and if you had a question you were answered withing minutes by various members. Today it is not like that, sadly.[/size]
[b] My suggestions:[/b]
Making MoparScape "The Mother of Games" or "The Mother of Private Servers"
I know that the original idea of MoparScape is RS Private Servers as written in the above banner, but you guys walked a bit to the side and added MineCraft. I think now it is the time to make MoparScape a Gaming Portal where you can be directed to different sections, each section will be different game. (The games can be chosen by searching for what people search the most in Google).
This will make the user base way more - since this community has a lot of registered users, new people that get here will register right away because they will trust that this community is for real and will succeed and will give the members what they are looking for.
I am sure many of the Mopar community are currently also playing other games or other private servers that are not RuneScape.
This is up to you.
Peace,
Sean

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED][Additional Gaming Catagories]Getting more Organic Traffic to Mopar
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

Wintercanon:

RuneScape and RSPS are sinking… There’s not a diverse enough community to attract new members for gaming other than RuneScape.

The community is US! the only way to make the comunity bigger is by US. by US I mean me and you doing actions to make people come here and stay here because it is interesting here and fun here.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED][Additional Gaming Catagories]Getting more Organic Traffic to Mopar
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:9, topic:534187”]I like this guys attitude! However adding more boards won’t add that much traffic here. Just because we add a league of legends board doesn’t mean we will take traffic from reddit or the league forums. Most of those games already have a huge userbase that is already devoted to a forum dedicated strictly to that game.

Why would they want to come to moparscape to discuss league, maple story, wow, etc when there are better alternatives? In my opinion you have to find a game that looks like it is about to take off and latch on to it then. That is what we did with minecraft when it first came out and that was actually pretty successful.

So try to name some new games that you think might blow up in the next year or so. The only one that comes to mind (I’m not an avid gamer) is DayZ mod.[/quote]

Thanks Newty,

I will be doing some researches of what could be the big new thing gaming wise and will post and it and you guys will tell me what you think about it…

Edit: In the past hour I managed to get a source file for RoTMG, I ran it and it works well - I would like to know if there are people that would like to join in trying to make this server succeed

Read full topic
item.source: [RESOLVED - DENIED][Additional Gaming Catagories]Getting more Organic Traffic to Mopar

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED][Additional Gaming Catagories]Getting more Organic Traffic to Mopar
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

I like this guys attitude! However adding more boards won’t add that much traffic here. Just because we add a league of legends board doesn’t mean we will take traffic from reddit or the league forums. Most of those games already have a huge userbase that is already devoted to a forum dedicated strictly to that game.

Why would they want to come to moparscape to discuss league, maple story, wow, etc when there are better alternatives? In my opinion you have to find a game that looks like it is about to take off and latch on to it then. That is what we did with minecraft when it first came out and that was actually pretty successful.

So try to name some new games that you think might blow up in the next year or so. The only one that comes to mind (I’m not an avid gamer) is DayZ mod.

Read full topic
